features: Purex Crystals is an in-wash fragrance booster, which provides freshness that lasts for weeks. Use a little or a lot, directly in the laundry!
Add Purex Crystals to the start of the wash cycle with detergent. It spends more time with your laundry injecting it with a fresh scent that lasts for weeks, not days.
Safe for all loads including towels, activewear & children’s sleepwear
Fresh Spring Waters - Wade into cool, enchanting waters and give your laundry long-lasting, just-washed freshness.
This item contains four 21 ounce bottles of Purex Crystals in-wash fragrance booster.
body.description: Wade into cool, enchanting waters and give your laundry long-lasting, just-washed freshness with Purex Crystals Fresh Spring Waters scent booster. Purex Crystals infuses your clothes with an extraordinary freshness that puts the finishing touch on your laundry and makes everyday a little more rewarding. With the exciting variety of fragrances Purex Crystals offers, it's easy to find a fragrance to match every laundry occasion. Whether it's a relaxing freshness for your sheets or a more stimulating scent for you and your family's activewear, Purex Crystals has you covered. Have fun and try them all! This package includes four 21-ounce bottle of Purex Crystals Fresh Spring Waters in-wash fragrance booster. Voted 2019 Product of the Year in laundry booster category and survey of 40,000 people by Kantar TNS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the fresh acent
reviews.reviewText: I purchased on a great sale because I missed having the extra boost of fresh scents. Couldn’t beat the price. The lid screws on to prevent spills which is nice. Very easy to use, simply dump in the washer and enjoy the extra boost of fresh smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these crystals. They leave my clothes smelling wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Me gusta mucho este producto
reviews.reviewText: Esta oferta me gusta mucho, solo que no me llegaron los 4 pomos solo 3 pero no estaba en casa y no pude hacer el reclamo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: great for a mattress pad cover - scent lasts awhile - I use small amounts - *plus - does not smell floral - happy with purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely LOVE this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the Purex crystals for years now, and unfortunately they’re getting hard to find. I started using them for my hedgehog’s towels and blankets because fabric softener makes the blankets and towels repel water. While this is great for many situations, the purpose of the towels and blankets are to absorb any wetness or urine, which eliminates the need for shredded bedding. This stuff was perfect! I sincerely hope they don’t discontinue this product because I like it FAR better than the waxy beads that other companies are making because those don’t dissolve completely whereas the crystals always do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These work great! If you especially have a front load washer. A little trick that I do is I always place them in the washer after each wash, that way they keep you washer fresh smelling with a nice order when you are not using your washer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This was supposed to be a 4 pack for the money I paid. I only got 1 21oz container.
reviews.reviewText: This was supposed to be a 4 pack. I only got 1 21oz container. Very disappointed. I needed it. Now I have to return the one bottle to get my over $15 back. In now way am I paying $15 for 1 bottle. Very frustrating and waste of my time. Going out of my way to try to return it. Can't even bring it to target to return. Now I have to go to the store to buy it as I needed it now. I would give 0 stars.
